target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The audit reported no findings, so no vulnerability type was identified or matched.

notes: The audit verdict is 'safe' with 0 findings, but the contract contains a critical vulnerability. The createLockedCampaign function (lines 58-94) makes an arbitrary external call to a user-controlled address (donation.tokenLocker) on line 85: `(bool success, ) = payable(donation.tokenLocker).call(data);`. This matches the ground truth exactly: an access_control vulnerability where an attacker can provide a malicious tokenLocker address to steal tokens from users who have approved the contract. The audit completely missed this critical issue.
